title: Gorilla Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Pizzeria, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Formerly Godzilla Pizza, a take away pizza bar that serves all the standard fare but also mentions vegans on its menu and provides options using vegan mozzarella, vegan pepperoni, vegan bacon, and vegan parmesan for its pasta dishes.
